name: Slot Hero
description:
Slot Hero

A brave hero embarks to an adventure with his trusty slot machine on his back. In order to defeat obstacles he must spin the machine and get a random set of skills. Every encounter will be different.

Controls:

Arrows / D-Pad (XBOX360) : Select

3 / Y (XBOX360) : Confirm

1, 2, 3, 4 / A, X, Y, B (XBOX360) : Activate skill
